entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Elk Island (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:17 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Elk Island National Park 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Temperature: -8.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -9.9°C
Wind: ENE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 6

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 09 January 2023
